output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CUI mandatar financiar coordonator: 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu PREÈ˜EDINTE" 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook ad targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly encouraging voting for Marcel Ciolacu as President 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication
The post contains several elements that make it electoral propaganda: - Direct mention of presidential candidate Marcel Ciolacu - Use of campaign hashtags (#MarcelCiolacu_PREÈ˜EDINTE) - Clear electoral messaging encouraging voting - Official party communication with mandatar financiar - Paid distribution targeting a large audience - Use of party symbols (ðŸŒ¹) and campaign slogans

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - It explicitly promotes Marcel Ciolacu for President - Contains official campaign elements (CUI mandatar) - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Has clear electoral messaging - Uses campaign hashtags and slogans - Is published by an official party page (PSD Gorj)
